content: Fix match_same_arms warning in get_current_tracing_level() function in mcp/src/support/tracing.rs - remove the explicit '1 => TracingLevel::Warn,' case since it's handled by default fallback
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after fixing match arms issue
Remove old brp_set_debug_mode reference from mcp/src/tools.rs line 114 - delete 'define_method!(brp_extras, set_debug_mode);'
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing old tool reference
Delete obsolete help text file mcp/help_text/brp_tools/brp_set_debug_mode.txt since we no longer have brp_set_debug_mode tool
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing help text
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues following rules: no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes, remove unused code
Create new file mcp/src/brp_tools/brp_get_trace_log_path.rs with tool implementation following same pattern as brp_set_tracing_level.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after creating tool file
Create help text file mcp/help_text/brp_tools/brp_get_trace_log_path.txt documenting tool purpose and return format
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after creating help text
Add 'define_method!(brp, get_trace_log_path);' to mcp/src/tools.rs around line 124 with other BRP tools
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after adding tool definition
Add 'pub mod brp_get_trace_log_path;' to mcp/src/brp_tools/mod.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after updating mod.rs
Add 'brp_get_trace_log_path::register_tool(),' to tools list in mcp/src/registry.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after updating registry
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings (final checkpoint)
Fix any final clippy issues following rules: no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes, remove unused code
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
